    Iterable<ComponentType>, EventListener, Channel, ComponentType, Eligible, Manager, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener
    public class ServiceListConlet
extends org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet<Serializable>
implements org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener
    A conlet for inspecting the services in an OSGi runtime.
